p:
The metadata associated with the sequence data is located on Edinburgh DataVault
23 . As the VIZIONS metadata include anonymised information on human subjects it cannot be made openly available. Researchers are required formally to request access to the database by contacting the Corresponding Author. Researchers will be required to complete a Data Release Request form that covers the purpose of the study, funding, ethical approvals, publication and intellectual property (Supplementary FileÂ 1).
